sentences.en: A method to calculate landscape mosaic diversity is introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 该文介绍一种分析景观镶嵌体多样性的方法.

sentences.en: I was admiring the exquisite workmanship in the mosaic.
sentences.cn: 我当时正在欣赏镶嵌画的精致做工.

sentences.en: If the abstract, mosaic, Plot portfolio and so forth.
sentences.cn: 如抽象的, 拼接的, 情节性组合的等等.

sentences.en: In many varieties PVX evokes an interveinal mosaic.
sentences.cn: PVX在许多品种上表现脉间花叶.

sentences.en: In the pavement was inserted a small and most exquisite mosaic.
sentences.cn: 地上镶嵌着一幅很小然而非常优美的画面.

sentences.en: It causes an infection called wheat streak mosaic virus.
sentences.cn: 它还引起了一场被称为小麦纺锤状条纹花叶病毒的传染病.

sentences.en: Major works of painting, sculpture, mosaic and architecture were examined in situ in Venice.
sentences.cn: 重要的绘画、雕塑、镶嵌画和建筑作品都在威尼斯原地得到了仔细检查。

sentences.en: Mosaic is one of the most widely distributed sugarcane diseases.
sentences.cn: 花叶病是分布最广泛的甘蔗病害之一.

sentences.en: Netscape 1.0 was written as an alternative browser to NCSA Mosaic.
rooms decorated with wall paintings and mosaics
sentences.cn: 用壁画和马赛克装饰的房间

sentences.en: The company mainly produces glass mosaic, glass and hollow glass milling.
sentences.cn: 公司主要生产镶嵌玻璃、中空玻璃和磨边玻璃.

sentences.en: The landscape was a discontinuous mosaic of fields and forest areas.
sentences.cn: 这里的风景是断断续续相间的田地和森林.

sentences.en: The mosaic consists of a metal plate covered with insulating material.
sentences.cn: 嵌镶光电阴极由涂有绝缘材料的金属板组成.

sentences.en: The mosaic is sometimes scarcely visible.
sentences.cn: 这种花叶有时候勉勉强强可见.

sentences.en: The sky this morning is a mosaic of blue and white.
sentences.cn: 今天早上的天空是幅蓝白相间的画面.

sentences.en: Two strains of turnip mosaic virus were identified on rape in Kiangsu.
sentences.cn: 江苏省为害油菜的?菁花叶病毒有黄斑及枯斑两个.
